body.p: With hypothesis you can annotate wherever on the web you want to and the link to that annotation will be displayed on the app.
Let's imagine you find a blog post where the Bitter Water Ordeal is discussed or a you find a photo somewhere which you would like to link to that Art Theme.
Then on that page make an Hypothes.is annotation and add to it the tag BetMas:AT1004Bitter.
Users loading those annotations will see the annotation you have made in the app.
